profileAlternative.name: Zhihan Li
profileAlternative.headline: Aspiring data science and machine learning intern
profileAlternative.summary:
A data science master student at NYU, focusing on NLP, Deep/Machine learning modeling and big data practice. Obtained my bachelor degree of mathematics at the University of Wisconsin-Madison with a certificate in computer science.

I have worked as a data science intern at Yifeng Pharmacy, the second biggest pharmaceutical retail chain enterprise in China, where I developed two recommendation systems to enable dietary supplements promotion and structured ARIMA model for customer churn prediction. I have also interned as a business analyst and conducted optimization research as an undergrad. My past experience and courses taken prepare me well for the data science and machine learning industry.

Looking for data science/machine learning/quantitative research internship for the summer of 2019.
